info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:07PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Eddy and west central Lea Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northeast of Loving, or 26 miles east of Carlsbad, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Halfway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
